name: The Biggest Loser Challenge
description:
One of the leading interactive health and fitness video games is back with The Biggest Loser Challenge.

Special Features

• Players will now enjoy more than 125 exercise moves in four different environments as well as choose from 10 pre-set fitness programs or customize their own!
• Players will be provided encouragement and given tips from trainers Bob Harper and Jillian Michaels, as well as show host Alison Sweeney and more than 70 former contestants.
